Camoflage::

She purred slightly as Malice stroked her head and nuzzled even 
closer to him.  Her mind was dreaming of past times. In her sleep, 
she muttered, " No, I don't want to go mommy. I can fight. I won't 
get rust sickness. Honest, I can stay, please let me stay mommy."  
She whimpered a bit and calmed down. 


Wolfblade::
She moved and rolled onto her back to see what had scratched her. It 
was Elita. She gently put her arm around the little sleeping bot and 
sighed. SHe very gently stroked Elita's head and shoulders and 
wondered how long the little bot had been there.  She thought to 
herself, Why do kids come around bots who have little to no 
experience with kids? I wonder if they do it on purpose just to raise 
a bot's oil pressure.
She turned her head to see that Malice had a little one sleeping at 
his side as well.  She wondered why the kids came to his room to 
sleep. THen something else occured to her. If kids could sneek in to 
this place, how easy would it be for an enemiy to sneek in and kill 
them. Especially when they were sleeping. This thought disturbed her 
enough to not let her fall back to sleep. She would wait for the kids 
to wake up, then address the matter with Malice.
